ref: 7739 pattrāṅga m. ʻ red sandal ʼ, n. ʻ Caesalpinia sappan ʼ Suśr., pattraṅga -- n. ʻ red sandal ʼ lex. [pattrāḍhya -- n. ʻ C. sappan ʼ, paṭṭaraṅga -- , ˚rāga -- , ˚rañjaka -- n. lex.: various forms through pop. etym. of unknown original with which cf. paṭira -- m. ʻ sandal tree ʼ Bhpr. EWA ii 201]
Si. patan̆gi, patän̆gi ʻ red sandal, sandalwood tree, Pterocarpus santalinus, Caesalpinia sappan ʼ.
